body.name: Dove Ultra Care Shampoo Daily Moisture for Dry Hair Shampoo with Bio-Restore Complex 12 oz
features: MOISTURIZING SHAMPOO: Dove Ultra Care Daily Moisture Shampoo with pump is specially designed to give your hair essential daily care, leaving it looking beautiful and healthy
FOR DRY HAIR: This shampoo deeply moisturizes dry hair, nourishing each strand to leave it soft and smooth
WITH BIO-RESTORE COMPLEX: This hydrating shampoo is formulated with our Bio-Restore complex for complete care that works in harmony with your hair
HOW TO USE: Apply this nourishing shampoo to wet hair, lather and rinse. For best results, use with Dove Ultra Care Daily Moisture Conditioner. Suitable for daily use
DAILY MOISTURE: Dove Daily Moisture is a moisturizing shampoo and conditioner system that makes hair soft, smooth, and manageable
THOUGHTFULLY MADE: This shampoo for dry hair is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA and is made in 100% recycled plastic bottles, so you can feel good about switching to Dove
body.description: Product Description To help prevent the damage done by daily wear and tear, Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo progressively cares for hair, leaving it feeling healthier when used as a part of a hair care system along with Dove Daily Moisture Conditioner. After the very first wash, this moisturizing shampoo helps to nourish and protect your hair from daily aggression, giving you silky, soft hair that's up to 10x more resilient when using system vs. non-conditioning shampoo. This Dove shampoo contains a unique formulation with Bio-Nourish Complex that smooths and progressively cares for hair deep inside. Even though you'll notice you're looking smoother after the first wash, Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo continues to nourish hair after each application, helping to make your hair feel healthier wash after wash. Its nourishing formula helps to form a shield around the hair fiber to protect it from daily damage, maintaining your hair's natural balance without weighing it down. After one shower, you'll feel that your hair is silky to the touch and easy to manage. How to use: Apply Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo to wet hair, lather and rinse. Brand Story By Dove

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #149,541 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #3,952 in Hair Shampoo

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Giving you manageable and silky hair that feels beautifully soft, Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo looks after damage with kindness. This moisturizing shampoo delicately cares for your hair, cleansing each strand to keep them soft and protected every day.

Daily Moisture This Dove Daily Moisture haircare system is specially designed to give your hair essential daily care, making it soft, smooth, and manageable. Bio-Restore Complex Dove Daily Moisture, with Bio-Restore Complex, works with hair’s surface to smooth and protect where it’s most vulnerable and stops daily damage due to breakage. The Dove Difference Dove has always drawn inspiration from real, diverse women. We celebrate real beauty, which we define as feeling and looking your best. Real Beauty Is Cruelty-Free Dove care goes beyond just your hair. This shampoo is the perfect addition to your Cruelty-Free beauty collection - just check out its PETA-certified logo. Plus, we are now moving all our bottles to 100% recycled plastic.

Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo, 20.4 oz Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner, 20.4 oz Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner, 12 oz Main Benefit Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo moisturizes your hair to leave it soft, smooth, and manageable. Dove Intensive Repair Conditioner nourishes to repair the appearance of damaged hair. Dove Coconut & Hydration Conditioner locks in moisture and nourishes your hair to leave it soft, smooth, and beautiful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for my hair
reviews.reviewText: This and the conditioner together make my hair really soft and smooth. And I love the scent. I like it much better than Pantene.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have used multiple shampoos, but this Dove Moisturizing Shampoo for me is the most positive shampoo I have used. I like the moisturizing result of the shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice product for the price
reviews.reviewText: Nice product for the price. Leaves your hair soft. I did not notice a Significant scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done
reviews.reviewText: I love Dove liquid body wash but this smell is a little different. Not bad, just different. I will buy another scent next time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this brand and I was able to find this one on sale, love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I have memories from the days I got covid whenever I go into my shower I just relax with the dove body wash & dove shampoo the smell is amazing and comforting 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars For Me It Works Better In Combination With Another Shampoo
reviews.reviewText: By itself I'm not that all impressed with the Dove Ultra Care Shampoo Daily Moisture for Dry Hair Shampoo. However, I use this first, risnse and then finish off with Renpure Biotin & Collagen Thickening shampoo. I like the results better with this combination than using either shampoo alone. I don't use conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dove Moisturizing Shampoo Great Value
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Dove Moisturizing Shampoo for many years. It has made my hair soft, silky and easy to manage. Everyone's hair is different so if you have not used it before try it out and maybe you'll have good results too.
